Title: Girl's Friends 14 Sai Kamlang Maw
Actors: Chalotorn Boriraj, Chutima Every, Natthawara Hongsuwan, Parichart Keawkumpol
Plot: Four teenage schoolgirls - Bee, Tum, Nui and Tim - have been friends for a long time, and have sworn to be true to one another forever. Their relationship is as colorful and lively as they ...
